title: simharUpa dEvA
sahitya:
simharUpa dEvAshrIhari


anupallavi

  simha garjana durjanulaku varadAbhaya nAdamu sajjanulaku nara


caraNam 1    parama bhaktulellA bahu dUramEgi parama shAntikai vedakedaru 
endu vedakinA andandu velasi varamulosagumA ilavElpai nara
    caraNam 2    jayajaya sundararAmA mundara priya muraLIrava pUrNa sudhAkara 
bhaya nivAraNA bhAgya svarUpA parama puruSa prahlAda varada nara
